fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player at night. You may use this as many times per night for each person you've killed so far, plus one.
- Attack all your visitors.
- Attack all of someone else's visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may not multitask multiple abilities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate absolutely everyone, including Neutrals who would otherwise assist you.
